thumb.title: ファイアーエムブレム蒼炎の軌跡マニアック最短攻略24章25章26章
thumb.description: ファイアーエムブレム蒼炎の軌跡マニアック最短攻略115ターンChapter 24 Expenditures: +2 might 0 crit Slim Lance forge (5486g). Spirit Dust for Mist. Chapter 24 Bexp used: Soren to level 7 (1331p to 1311p). Chapter 25 Expenditures: +2 might +15 hit 0 crit Thunder tome (7422g). Chapter 25 Bexp used: Chapter 26 Expenditures: Speedwing and Ashera Icon to Reyson. Chapter 26 Bexp used: Tanith to level 13 (1661p to 1631p). Reyson to level 9 (1631p to 840p).
